Enums/ZKErrorCode.html#/c:@E@ZKErrorCode.name: ZKWalletError
Enums/ZKErrorCode.html#/c:@E@ZKErrorCode.abstract: Something was wrong with the given wallet operation.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKAccountTypeSTANDARD.name: ZKAccountTypeSTANDARD
Constants.html#/c:@ZKAccountTypeSTANDARD.abstract: Corresponds to standard Ethereum account type and Bitcoin non-segwit account type P2PKH.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKAccountTypeSEGWIT.name: ZKAccountTypeSEGWIT
Constants.html#/c:@ZKAccountTypeSEGWIT.abstract: Corresponds to Segregated Witness Bitcoin account type P2WPKH and are also reffered to as bech32 addresses.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKExchangeStatusPAUSE.name: ZKExchangeStatusPAUSED
Constants.html#/c:@ZKExchangeStatusPAUSE.abstract: Exchange has been paused by Transaction Service before being submitted to blockchain.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKExchangeStatusREJEC.name: ZKExchangeStatusREJECTED
Constants.html#/c:@ZKExchangeStatusREJEC.abstract: Exchange has been rejected by Transaction Service before being submitted to blockchain.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKExchangeStatusPENDI.name: ZKExchangeStatusPENDING
Constants.html#/c:@ZKExchangeStatusPENDI.abstract: Deposit transaction has been submitted to blockchain.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKExchangeStatusDEPOS.name: ZKExchangeStatusDEPOSITED
Constants.html#/c:@ZKExchangeStatusDEPOS.abstract: Deposit transaction has been mined and exchange has been initiated.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKExchangeStatusRESUB.name: ZKExchangeStatusRESUBMITTED
Constants.html#/c:@ZKExchangeStatusRESUB.abstract: Ethereum deposit transaction was overriden by sending the same transaction with higher gas price.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKExchangeStatusCANCE.name: ZKExchangeStatusCANCELLED
Constants.html#/c:@ZKExchangeStatusCANCE.abstract: Ethereum deposit transaction was overriden by a different transaction with higher gas price than

Constants.html#/c:@ZKTransactionStatusPA.name: ZKTransactionStatusPAUSED
Constants.html#/c:@ZKTransactionStatusPA.abstract: Transaction has been paused by Transaction Service before being submitted to blockchain.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKTransactionStatusRE.name: ZKTransactionStatusREJECTED
Constants.html#/c:@ZKTransactionStatusRE.abstract: Transaction has been rejected by Transaction Service before being submitted to blockchain.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKTransactionStatusCO.name: ZKTransactionStatusCONFIRMED
Constants.html#/c:@ZKTransactionStatusCO.abstract: Transacion was confirmed and added to blockchain.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKTransactionStatusRE.name: ZKTransactionStatusRESUBMITTED
Constants.html#/c:@ZKTransactionStatusRE.abstract: Ethereum transaction was overriden by sending the same transaction with higher gas price.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKTransactionStatusCA.name: ZKTransactionStatusCANCELLED
Constants.html#/c:@ZKTransactionStatusCA.abstract: Ethereum transaction was overriden by a different transaction with higher gas price than the previously

Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeACC.name: ZKZumoKitErrorCodeACCOUNTLIMITEXCEEDED
Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeACC.abstract: New account could not be created. Account already exists.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeALR.name: ZKZumoKitErrorCodeALREADYMODULRCUSTOMER
Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeALR.abstract: Could not make user Modulr customer. User is already Modulr customer.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeAMO.name: ZKZumoKitErrorCodeAMOUNTNOTSET
Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeAMO.abstract: Amount not set. Either send max has to be enabled or send max set.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeDAT.name: ZKZumoKitErrorCodeDATAPROVIDEDWHENSENDMAXSET
Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeDAT.abstract: Cannot set data when send max enabled.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeDES.name: ZKZumoKitErrorCodeDESTINATIONPROVIDEDWHENWITHDRAWSET
Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeDES.abstract: Destination cannot be set when withdrawing funds to nominated account.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeEXC.name: ZKZumoKitErrorCodeEXCHANGERETURNVALUENEGATIVE
Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeEXC.abstract: Exchange amount too low. Fees exceed return value.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeGAS.name: ZKZumoKitErrorCodeGASOVERFLOW
Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeGAS.abstract: Gas too long. Cumulative gas limit and gas price should not exceed 30 bytes.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeGAS.name: ZKZumoKitErrorCodeGASTOOLOW
Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeGAS.abstract: Gas too low. Gas price and gas limit should be higher than 0.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeINC.name: ZKZumoKitErrorCodeINCOMPATIBLENETWORKTYPES
Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeINC.abstract: Change account and source accounts have to be on the same network.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeINS.name: ZKZumoKitErrorCodeINSUFFICIENTFUNDS
Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeINS.abstract: Insufficient funds for transaction value and fee.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeINV.name: ZKZumoKitErrorCodeINVALIDACCOUNTTYPE
Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeINV.abstract: Account type not supported by the operation.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeINV.name: ZKZumoKitErrorCodeINVALIDEXCHANGERATE
Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeINV.abstract: Mismatch between exchange rate and selected deposit/withdraw accounts.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeINV.name: ZKZumoKitErrorCodeINVALIDEXCHANGESETTINGS
Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeINV.abstract: Mismatch between exchange settings and selected deposit/withdraw accounts.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeINV.name: ZKZumoKitErrorCodeINVALIDFEERATE
Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeINV.abstract: Invalid fee rate. Fee rate should be an integer value.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeINV.name: ZKZumoKitErrorCodeINVALIDHDWALLETPATH
Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeINV.abstract: Requested private key derivation path is invalid.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeINV.name: ZKZumoKitErrorCodeINVALIDNETWORKTYPE
Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeINV.abstract: Network type not supported by requested operation.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeINV.name: ZKZumoKitErrorCodeINVALIDRECOVERYPHRASE
Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeINV.abstract: “The provided recovery phrase does not correspond to existing wallet.”

Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeNOD.name: ZKZumoKitErrorCodeNODESTINATIONADDRESS
Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeNOD.abstract: No destination address. In case no transaction data is provided, destination address is obligatory.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeNOW.name: ZKZumoKitErrorCodeNOWALLETFOUND
Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeNOW.abstract: Requested operation requies existance of a wallet. No wallet was found.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeNON.name: ZKZumoKitErrorCodeNONCEOVERFLOW
Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeNON.abstract: Nonce too long. Maximum supported nonce size is 32 bytes.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeSEN.name: ZKZumoKitErrorCodeSENDMAXINSUFFICIENTFUNDSFORFEE
Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeSEN.abstract: Insufficient funds to pay the transaction fee.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeSEN.name: ZKZumoKitErrorCodeSENDMAXINSUFFICIENTFUNDSFORTRANSACTION
Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeSEN.abstract: Transaction amount is too small to send after the fee has been deducted.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeTRA.name: ZKZumoKitErrorCodeTRANSACTIONSERVICEERROR
Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeTRA.abstract: Invalid response received from ZumoKit Transaction Service API.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeUSE.name: ZKZumoKitErrorCodeUSERNOTMODULRCUSTOMER
Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeUSE.abstract: Fiat account could no be created. User is not yet a Modulr customer on selected network.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeUTX.name: ZKZumoKitErrorCodeUTXOSIGNINGERROR
Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeUTX.abstract: Unspent transaction output could not be signed.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeAMO.name: ZKZumoKitErrorCodeAMOUNTPROVIDEDWHENSENDMAXSET
Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeAMO.abstract: Cannot set amount when send max enabled. Set amount to null if trying t send maximum funds.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeWAL.name: ZKZumoKitErrorCodeWALLETLIMITEXCEEDED
Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeWAL.abstract: Wallet could not be created. Wallet already exists.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeINV.name: ZKZumoKitErrorCodeINVALIDUSERTOKENSET
Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeINV.abstract: Invalid user token set. User token set should be a valid stringified JSON with accessToken, refreshToken and expiresIn properties.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorTypeAPI.name: ZKZumoKitErrorTypeAPIERROR
Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorTypeAPI.abstract: Default error if something goes wrong on our side.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorTypeWAL.name: ZKZumoKitErrorTypeWALLETERROR
Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorTypeWAL.abstract: Wallet errors are the most common type of error you should expect to handle.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorTypeINV.name: ZKZumoKitErrorTypeINVALIDREQUESTERROR
Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorTypeINV.abstract: Invalid request errors arise when request to API has invalid parameters.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorTypeRAT.name: ZKZumoKitErrorTypeRATELIMITERROR
Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorTypeRAT.abstract: Too many requests hit the API too quickly.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorTypeINV.name: ZKZumoKitErrorTypeINVALIDARGUMENTERROR
Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorTypeINV.abstract: Errors triggered when failing to validate arguments,

Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorTypeKey.name: ZKZumoKitErrorTypeKey
Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorTypeKey.abstract: Error type, such as api_connection_error, api_error, wallet_error etc.

Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeKey.name: ZKZumoKitErrorCodeKey
Constants.html#/c:@ZKZumoKitErrorCodeKey.abstract: In case an error could be handled programmatically in addition to error type error code is returned.

Classes/ZumoKit.html#/c:objc(cs)ZumoKit(.name: +version
Classes/ZumoKit.html#/c:objc(cs)ZumoKit(.abstract: ZumoKit SDK semantic version tag if exists, commit hash otherwise.

Classes/ZumoKit.html#/c:objc(cs)ZumoKit(.name: -initWithApiKey:apiUrl:txServiceUrl:
Classes/ZumoKit.html#/c:objc(cs)ZumoKit(.abstract: Initializes ZumoKit SDK. Should only be called once.

Classes/ZumoKit.html#/c:objc(cs)ZumoKit(.name: -authUser:completion:
Classes/ZumoKit.html#/c:objc(cs)ZumoKit(.abstract: Authenticates user token set and returns corresponding user. On success user is set as active user.

Classes/ZumoKit.html#/c:objc(cs)ZumoKit(.name: -getExchangeRate:toCurrency:
Classes/ZumoKit.html#/c:objc(cs)ZumoKit(.abstract: Get exchange rate for selected currency pair.

Classes/ZumoKit.html#/c:objc(cs)ZumoKit(.name: -getExchangeSettings:toCurrency:
Classes/ZumoKit.html#/c:objc(cs)ZumoKit(.abstract: Get exchange settings for selected currency pair.

Classes/ZumoKit.html#/c:objc(cs)ZumoKit(.name: -getFeeRates:
Classes/ZumoKit.html#/c:objc(cs)ZumoKit(.abstract: Get fee rates for selected crypto currency.

Classes/ZumoKit.html#/c:objc(cs)ZumoKit(.name: -fetchHistoricalExchangeRates:
Classes/ZumoKit.html#/c:objc(cs)ZumoKit(.abstract: Fetch historical exchange rates for supported time intervals.

Classes/ZKWallet.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKWalle.name: -composeBtcTransaction:changeAccountId:destination:amount:feeRate:sendMax:callback:
Classes/ZKWallet.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKWalle.abstract: Compose Bitcoin transaction asynchronously. Refer to Send Transactions guide for usage details.

Classes/ZKWallet.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKWalle.name: -composeEthTransaction:gasPrice:gasLimit:destination:amount:data:nonce:sendMax:callback:
Classes/ZKWallet.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKWalle.abstract: Compose Ethereum transaction asynchronously. Refer to Send Transactions guide for usage details.

Classes/ZKWallet.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKWalle.name: -composeInternalFiatTransaction:toAccountId:amount:sendMax:callback:
Classes/ZKWallet.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKWalle.abstract: Compose fiat transaction between users in Zumo ecosystem asynchronously. Refer to Send Transactions guide for usage details.

Classes/ZKWallet.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKWalle.name: -composeTransactionToNominatedAccount:amount:sendMax:callback:
Classes/ZKWallet.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKWalle.abstract: Compose transaction to nominated account asynchronously. Refer to Send Transactions guide for usage details.

Classes/ZKWallet.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKWalle.name: -submitTransaction:callback:
Classes/ZKWallet.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKWalle.abstract: Submit a transaction asynchronously. Refer to Send Transactions guide for usage details.

Classes/ZKWallet.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKWalle.name: -composeExchange:withdrawAccountId:exchangeRate:exchangeSettings:amount:sendMax:callback:
Classes/ZKWallet.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKWalle.abstract: Compose Bitcoin transaction asynchronously. Refer to Make Exchanges guide for usage details.

Classes/ZKWallet.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKWalle.name: -submitExchange:callback:
Classes/ZKWallet.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKWalle.abstract: Submit an exchange asynchronously. Make Exchanges guide for usage details.

Classes/ZKUtils.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKUtils(.name: -generateMnemonic:
Classes/ZKUtils.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKUtils(.abstract: Generates mnemonic seed phrase used in wallet creation process.

Classes/ZKUtils.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKUtils(.name: -isValidBtcAddress:network:
Classes/ZKUtils.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKUtils(.abstract: Validates Bitcoin address on a given network.

Classes/ZKUser.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKUser(im.name: -isActiveUser
Classes/ZKUser.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKUser(im.abstract: Check if user is currenly active user. Only one user can be active at a time.

Classes/ZKUser.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKUser(im.name: -isModulrCustomer:
Classes/ZKUser.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKUser(im.abstract: Check if user is a Modulr customer on ‘MAINNET’ or ‘TESTNET’ network.

Classes/ZKUser.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKUser(im.name: -makeModulrCustomer:firstName:middleName:lastName:dateOfBirth:email:phone:addressLine1:addressLine2:country:postCode:postTown:callback:
Classes/ZKUser.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKUser(im.abstract: Make user Modulr customer on specified network by providing user’s personal details.

Classes/ZKUser.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKUser(im.name: -createFiatAccount:currencyCode:callback:
Classes/ZKUser.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKUser(im.abstract: Create fiat account on specified network and currency code. User must already be Modulr customer on specified network.

Classes/ZKUser.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKUser(im.name: -getNominatedAccountFiatProperties:callback:
Classes/ZKUser.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKUser(im.abstract: Get nominated account details for specified account if it exists.

Classes/ZKUser.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKUser(im.name: -createWallet:password:callback:
Classes/ZKUser.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKUser(im.abstract: Create user wallet seeded by provided mnemonic and encrypted with user’s password.

Classes/ZKUser.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKUser(im.name: -revealMnemonic:callback:
Classes/ZKUser.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKUser(im.abstract: Reveal menmonic seed phrase used to seed user wallet.

Classes/ZKUser.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKUser(im.name: -isRecoveryMnemonic:
Classes/ZKUser.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKUser(im.abstract: Check if mnemonic seed phrase corresponds to user’s wallet.

Classes/ZKUser.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKUser(im.name: -recoverWallet:password:callback:
Classes/ZKUser.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKUser(im.abstract: Recover user wallet with mnemonic seed phrase corresponding to user’s wallet.

Classes/ZKUser.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKUser(im.name: -getAccount:network:type:
Classes/ZKUser.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKUser(im.abstract: Get account in specific currency, on specific network, with specific type.

Classes/ZKTransactionCryptoProperties.ht.name: nonce
Classes/ZKTransactionCryptoProperties.ht.abstract: Ethereum transaction nonce if greater than 0 and

Classes/ZKTransactionCryptoProperties.ht.name: toAddress
Classes/ZKTransactionCryptoProperties.ht.abstract: Wallet address of receiver or null, if it is Ethereum contract deploy.

Classes/ZKTransactionCryptoProperties.ht.name: gasPrice
Classes/ZKTransactionCryptoProperties.ht.abstract: Ethereum gas price if it is Ethereum transaction, otherwise null.

Classes/ZKTransactionCryptoProperties.ht.name: gasLimit
Classes/ZKTransactionCryptoProperties.ht.abstract: Ethereum gas limit if it is Ethereum transaction, otherwise null.

Classes/ZKTransactionCryptoProperties.ht.name: fiatAmount
Classes/ZKTransactionCryptoProperties.ht.abstract: Amount in fiat currencies at the time of the transaction submission.

Classes/ZKTransactionCryptoProperties.ht.name: fiatFee
Classes/ZKTransactionCryptoProperties.ht.abstract: Fee in fiat currencies at the time of the transaction submission.

Classes/ZKTransaction.html#/c:objc(cs)ZK.name: fromUserId
Classes/ZKTransaction.html#/c:objc(cs)ZK.abstract: Sender integrator user identifier or null if it is external user.

Classes/ZKTransaction.html#/c:objc(cs)ZK.name: toUserId
Classes/ZKTransaction.html#/c:objc(cs)ZK.abstract: Recipient integrator user identifier or null if it is external user.

Classes/ZKTransaction.html#/c:objc(cs)ZK.name: fromAccountId
Classes/ZKTransaction.html#/c:objc(cs)ZK.abstract: Sender account identifier if it is internal transaction or null otherwise.

Classes/ZKTransaction.html#/c:objc(cs)ZK.name: toAccountId
Classes/ZKTransaction.html#/c:objc(cs)ZK.abstract: Recipient account identifier if it is internal transaction or null otherwise.

Classes/ZKTransaction.html#/c:objc(cs)ZK.name: amount
Classes/ZKTransaction.html#/c:objc(cs)ZK.abstract: Amount in transaction currency or null if transaction is Ethereum contract deploy.

Classes/ZKTransaction.html#/c:objc(cs)ZK.name: fee
Classes/ZKTransaction.html#/c:objc(cs)ZK.abstract: Transaction fee in transaction currency or null, if not yet available.

Classes/ZKTransaction.html#/c:objc(cs)ZK.name: nonce
Classes/ZKTransaction.html#/c:objc(cs)ZK.abstract: Transaction nonce or null. Used to prevent double spend.

Classes/ZKTransaction.html#/c:objc(cs)ZK.name: cryptoProperties
Classes/ZKTransaction.html#/c:objc(cs)ZK.abstract: Crypto properties if it is a crypto transaction, null otherwise.

Classes/ZKTransaction.html#/c:objc(cs)ZK.name: fiatProperties
Classes/ZKTransaction.html#/c:objc(cs)ZK.abstract: Fiat properties if it is a fiat transaction, null otherwise.

Classes/ZKTransaction.html#/c:objc(cs)ZK.name: exchange
Classes/ZKTransaction.html#/c:objc(cs)ZK.abstract: Exchange properties if it is a transaction associated with an exchange, null otherwise.

Classes/ZKTransaction.html#/c:objc(cs)ZK.name: submittedAt
Classes/ZKTransaction.html#/c:objc(cs)ZK.abstract: Epoch timestamp when transaction was submitted or null for incoming transactions from outside of Zumo ecosystem.

Classes/ZKTransaction.html#/c:objc(cs)ZK.name: confirmedAt
Classes/ZKTransaction.html#/c:objc(cs)ZK.abstract: Epoch timestamp when transaction was submitted or null if transaction was not confirmed yet.

Classes/ZKTransaction.html#/c:objc(cs)ZK.name: timestamp
Classes/ZKTransaction.html#/c:objc(cs)ZK.abstract: Epoch timestamp, minimum non-null value between submitted at and confirmed at timestamps.

Classes/ZKFeeRates.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKFee.name: slow
Classes/ZKFeeRates.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKFee.abstract: Fee rate resulting in slow confirmation time.

Classes/ZKFeeRates.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKFee.name: average
Classes/ZKFeeRates.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKFee.abstract: Fee rate resulting in average confirmation time.

Classes/ZKFeeRates.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKFee.name: fast
Classes/ZKFeeRates.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKFee.abstract: Fee rate resulting in fast confirmation time.

Classes/ZKExchangeSettings.html#/c:objc(.name: depositAddress
Classes/ZKExchangeSettings.html#/c:objc(.abstract: Zumo Exchange Service wallet address for each network type.

Classes/ZKExchangeSettings.html#/c:objc(.name: minExchangeAmount
Classes/ZKExchangeSettings.html#/c:objc(.abstract: Minimum amount that can be exchanged in outgoing transaction currency.

Classes/ZKExchangeSettings.html#/c:objc(.name: feeRate
Classes/ZKExchangeSettings.html#/c:objc(.abstract: Exchange fee rate that will be charged once currency is exchanged.

Classes/ZKExchangeSettings.html#/c:objc(.name: depositFeeRate
Classes/ZKExchangeSettings.html#/c:objc(.abstract: Fee rate that will be used for outgoing transaction.

Classes/ZKExchangeSettings.html#/c:objc(.name: withdrawFee
Classes/ZKExchangeSettings.html#/c:objc(.abstract: Fee that will charged for return transaction.

Classes/ZKExchangeSettings.html#/c:objc(.name: timestamp
Classes/ZKExchangeSettings.html#/c:objc(.abstract: Epoch timestamp when the exchange settings were last updated.

Classes/ZKExchangeRate.html#/c:objc(cs)Z.name: depositCurrency
Classes/ZKExchangeRate.html#/c:objc(cs)Z.abstract: Currency from which exchange is being made.

Classes/ZKExchangeRate.html#/c:objc(cs)Z.name: withdrawCurrency
Classes/ZKExchangeRate.html#/c:objc(cs)Z.abstract: Currency from which exchange is being made.

Classes/ZKExchangeRate.html#/c:objc(cs)Z.name: value
Classes/ZKExchangeRate.html#/c:objc(cs)Z.abstract: Value of 1 unit of deposit currency in withdraw currency.

Classes/ZKExchangeRate.html#/c:objc(cs)Z.name: validTo
Classes/ZKExchangeRate.html#/c:objc(cs)Z.abstract: Epoch timestamp representing expiration time of this exchange rate.

Classes/ZKExchangeRate.html#/c:objc(cs)Z.name: timestamp
Classes/ZKExchangeRate.html#/c:objc(cs)Z.abstract: Epoch timestamp when the exchange rate was issued.

Classes/ZKExchange.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKExc.name: returnAmount
Classes/ZKExchange.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKExc.abstract: Amount that user receives, calculated as amount X exchangeRate X (1 - feeRate) - withdrawFee.

Classes/ZKExchange.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKExc.name: exchangeFee
Classes/ZKExchange.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKExc.abstract: Exchange fee, calculated as amount X exchangeRate X feeRate.

Classes/ZKExchange.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKExc.name: exchangeRates
Classes/ZKExchange.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKExc.abstract: Exchange rates at the time exchange was made.

Classes/ZKExchange.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKExc.name: nonce
Classes/ZKExchange.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKExc.abstract: Exchange nonce or null. Used to prevent double spend.

Classes/ZKExchange.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKExc.name: confirmedAt
Classes/ZKExchange.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKExc.abstract: Epoch timestamp when transaction was confirmed or null if not yet confirmed.

Classes/ZKComposedTransaction.html#/c:ob.name: signedTransaction
Classes/ZKComposedTransaction.html#/c:ob.abstract: Signed transaction for a crypto transaction, null otherwise.

Classes/ZKComposedTransaction.html#/c:ob.name: destination
Classes/ZKComposedTransaction.html#/c:ob.abstract: Transaction destination, i.e. destination address for crypto transactions or user id for fiat transactions.

Classes/ZKComposedExchange.html#/c:objc(.name: signedTransaction
Classes/ZKComposedExchange.html#/c:objc(.abstract: Signed transaction for a crypto transaction, null otherwise.

Classes/ZKComposedExchange.html#/c:objc(.name: exchangeAddress
Classes/ZKComposedExchange.html#/c:objc(.abstract: Zumo Exchange Service wallet address where outgoing crypto funds were deposited,

Classes/ZKComposedExchange.html#/c:objc(.name: returnValue
Classes/ZKComposedExchange.html#/c:objc(.abstract: Amount that user receives, calculated as value X exchangeRate X (1 - feeRate) - withdrawFee.

Classes/ZKComposedExchange.html#/c:objc(.name: exchangeFee
Classes/ZKComposedExchange.html#/c:objc(.abstract: Exchange fee, calculated as value X exchangeRate X feeRate.

Classes/ZKComposedExchange.html#/c:objc(.name: nonce
Classes/ZKComposedExchange.html#/c:objc(.abstract: Unique nonce used to prevent double spend.

Classes/ZKAccountCryptoProperties.html#/.name: nonce
Classes/ZKAccountCryptoProperties.html#/.abstract: Ethereum account nonce if greater than 0 or null otherwise.

Classes/ZKAccount.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKAcco.name: cryptoProperties
Classes/ZKAccount.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKAcco.abstract: Account crypto properties if account is a crypto account, otherwise null.

Classes/ZKAccount.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKAcco.name: fiatProperties
Classes/ZKAccount.html#/c:objc(cs)ZKAcco.abstract: Account fiat properties if account is a fiat account, otherwise null.

Classes/ZKComposedExchange.html.name: ZKComposedExchange
Classes/ZKComposedExchange.html.abstract: Record containing result of the compose exchange method on ZKWallet object.

Classes/ZKComposedTransaction.html.name: ZKComposedTransaction
Classes/ZKComposedTransaction.html.abstract: Record containing result of one of the transaction compose methods on ZKWallet object.

Classes/ZKExchangeRate.html.name: ZKExchangeRate
Classes/ZKExchangeRate.html.abstract: Record containing Zumo exchange rates used in making exchanges.

Classes/ZKExchangeSettings.html.name: ZKExchangeSettings
Classes/ZKExchangeSettings.html.abstract: Record containing Zumo exchange settings used in making exchanges.

Classes/ZKUser.html.name: ZKUser
Classes/ZKUser.html.abstract: User class provides methods for managing user wallet and accounts.

Classes/ZKUtils.html.name: ZKUtils
Classes/ZKUtils.html.abstract: Utility class providing blockchain related utility methods. Accessed from ZKZumoKit class.

Classes/ZKWallet.html.name: ZKWallet
Classes/ZKWallet.html.abstract: User wallet provides methods for transfer and exchange of fiat and cryptocurrency funds.

Classes/ZKZumoKitErrorCode.html.name: ZKZumoKitErrorCode
Classes/ZKZumoKitErrorCode.html.abstract: The code of error returned. Some errors that could be handled programmatically (e.g., balance too low)

Classes/ZKZumoKitErrorType.html.name: ZKZumoKitErrorType
Classes/ZKZumoKitErrorType.html.abstract: The type of error returned. In case of wallet errors, these errors can be safely displayed to the end users.

Categories/NSError%28ZumoKit%29.html#/c:.name: +errorFromZumoKitException:code:message:
Categories/NSError%28ZumoKit%29.html#/c:.abstract: Creates an NSError object extended with error type and error code.

Categories/NSError%28ZumoKit%29.html#/c:.name: -throw
Categories/NSError%28ZumoKit%29.html#/c:.abstract: Creates an exception with the name “NSError”, setting the reason to the debugDescription.

Categories/NSError%28ZumoKit%29.html.name: NSError(ZumoKit)
Categories/NSError%28ZumoKit%29.html.abstract: NSError extension with error type and error code and message.

Type%20Definitions.html.name: Type Definitions
Type%20Definitions.html.abstract: The following type definitions are available globally.
